comment: The value of the cardinal number function. Definition 10.4 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 85. See ~ cardval2 for a simpler version of its value. (Contributed by NM, 21-Oct-2003.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 28-Apr-2015.)
